channel.title: Errors, when trying to add dicing!
channel.description:
Please any information could be helpful....
Explanation; I was trying to add dicing to my server using this guide [code]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,508501.80.html[/code] I got these errors when trying to compile! [code]src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:40: error: <identifier> expecte d c.long diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:40: error: not a statement c.long diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:54: error: <identifier> expecte d c.long diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:54: error: not a statement c.long diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:68: error: <identifier> expecte d c.long diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:68: error: not a statement c.long diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ 6 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
My source is based off of Teamtorva [Pi]! please someone help!, i asked for help on the guide but no one replied yet so im asking here ! please help thanks

item.title: Errors, when trying to add dicing!
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

i answered in your other thread

public long diceDelay;

Read full topic

@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Change the long to an int.

item.title: Errors, when trying to add dicing!
item.dc:creator: @Jake440 Jake440
item.description:
@Jake440 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:2, topic:422978”]where does that “long comes from”
doesn’t it just have to be
c.diceDelay[/quote]

yeah my friend told me to put .long when i put .dicedelay normally these are the errors i get

src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:106: error: possible loss of pre cision c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ required: int found: long src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:113: error: possible loss of pre cision c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ required: int found: long src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:120: error: possible loss of pre cision c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ required: int found: long src\server\model\players\packets\ClickItem.java:127: error: possible loss of pre cision c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ required: int found: long src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:36: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:40: error: possible loss of pre cision c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ required: int found: long src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:41: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ Diceamount2 +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:50: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:54: error: possible loss of pre cision c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ required: int found: long src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:55: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ Diceamount1 +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:64: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:68: error: possible loss of pre cision c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ required: int found: long src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:69: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ DiceamountB +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:78: error: package Server does not exist if(c.clanId >= 0 && Server.clanChat.clans[c.clanId].owner.equalsIgnoreCase(c.pla yerName) && System.currentTimeMillis() - c.diceDelay >= 5000) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:82: error: possible loss of pre cision c.diceDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); ^ required: int found: long src\server\model\players\packets\ItemClick2.java:83: error: package Server does not exist Server.clanChat.messageToClan("" + c.playerName + " rolled a "+ Diceamount3 +" o n the amount dice.", c.clanId); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 16 errors Press any key to continue . . .
thanks for taking the time to look at my post btw.

Read full topic
